entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who knew about Harry's connection to Voldemort and his mother's sacrifice. He said 'I guessed' which implies he had some knowledge or understanding of this situation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who has a connection to Voldemort through his mother's sacrifice. Dumbledore mentioned that Harry and Voldemort have 'journeyed together into realms of magic hitherto unknown'.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist in the story who has a connection to Harry through his mother's sacrifice. Dumbledore mentioned that Voldemort and Harry have 'journeyed together into realms of magic hitherto unknown'.

entities.name: voldemort's hope
entities.description: Voldemort's last hope is for himself, which is connected to Harry through his mother's sacrifice. Dumbledore mentioned that as long as the enchantment survives, so does Voldemort's hope.

entities.name: enchantment
entities.description: The enchantment was laid upon Harry by his mother when she died for him. It keeps her sacrifice alive and is connected to Voldemort's last hope.

relationships.description: Dumbledore knew about Harry's connection to Voldemort and his mother's sacrifice.
Voldemort is connected to Harry through his mother's sacrifice.
Dumbledore and Voldemort are opponents in the story.
Harry is connected to the enchantment through his mother's sacrifice.
Voldemort's last hope is dependent on the enchantment surviving.
